oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kitāb Nashr al-ṭāliʻ / li-Sajaqlīzādah : manuscript, 1774
Nashr al-Ṭawāliʻ
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sājaqlīzādah, Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr , -1737
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 21 lines per page, in black and red.
According to the colophon (f. 109r), copy completed in the hand of ʻUmar ibn Sulaymān al-Ṭarabzūnī on 1 Rabīʻ al-Awwal 1188 AH [May 12, 1774 AD].
Inside front cover: Bound in 2 Shaʻbān 1312 AH [January 28, 1895 AD], probably by al-Shaykh Zāhid al-ʻAṭṭār [See MS Arab 302 for the binder's name].
Ownership statement signed Ḥāfiẓ Ismāʻīl ibn Idrīs. (f. 1r)
MS Arab 312. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
